name: LADY KOVA: The Magic Disorder
description:
LADY KOVA: The Magic Disorder is an FPS Roguelite game for the PC.

◈ Story ◈

           Lady Kova is the most powerful witch in the world. One day, she discovered an ancient spell giving the world unlimited resources using four elements. Starting with earth, water, wind, and fire, but the incident was not like that. The magic is disordered! All the elements are spread out in different places. It transformed itself into monsters with the element's power. She was responsible enough to take care of the matter, but she didn't want anyone to know who caused the trouble. So she had secretly found all the elements.
